resource.title: Creative Video Upscaler Workflow with AnimateDiff Techniques
resource.description: Multi-pass video upscaling workflow that uses AnimateDiff techniques to upscale videos from 480p to 1080p with face detailing, image upscaling models, and context options for high VRAM efficiency
resource.creator: Cseti

requirements: 100GB RAM (can be reduced by using fewer passes or bypassing image upscales)
Various upscaler models (DeJPG, skin enhancer, 4xclearreality, etc.)
recommended_settings: Use context options during upscaling at low denoise
Different block swap for each pass
Enable face detailer for separate face upscaling pass
tips: Use image upscale models before every sampling
Context switching is barely noticeable at low denoise
Can bypass image upscale nodes to reduce RAM usage
Use different upscaler models for different content types
Prompt explicitly to avoid unwanted hallucination
usage.workflow_notes: Complex workflow with multiple basic functionalities - not simple plug-and-play. Can be optimized with loop nodes for iterative passes.

technical_details: Multi-pass upscaling with image enhancement between steps
Face segmentation and separate detailing pass
Context options enable longer video upscales on limited VRAM
Automated context options based on resolution thresholds
TensorRT upscaler node integration for speed
VACE integration for better consistency and reference preservation

issues_and_solutions.issue: Video start frequently flashes when using context options
issues_and_solutions.solution: Issue occurs specifically with context options - needs further testing
Bypass image upscale nodes or use fewer passes, add RAM clearing nodes

issues_and_solutions.issue: Face detailer errors when no face in frames
issues_and_solutions.solution: Use custom face composite node that ignores empty masks, adjust mask grow/blur options
Use higher shift values, larger resolution, full precision models, face LoRAs for consistency

issues_and_solutions.issue: Batch processing inconsistencies at cut points
issues_and_solutions.solution: Use VACE for transitions between batches, or process as single long sequence with context options

summary: A comprehensive multi-pass video upscaling workflow that combines AnimateDiff techniques with modern upscaling models to achieve high-quality 480p to 1080p upscaling on 16GB VRAM. The workflow features face detailing, VACE integration for better consistency, and various optimizations for memory efficiency, though it requires significant RAM and processing time.
